title: How to write a female teacher job continuation letter - Quora

response.answer_text: From address (excluding name) Date (dd month year) To address Subject: (Letter informing my willingness to continue) Sir, I write this letter to formally express my willingness to continue as the (position in your school, meaning English teacher or whatever) in the upcoming academic year. Working in this institution under your guidance and leadership has been quite fruitful in the development of my career as a teacher/educator. I aspire to continue nurturing young minds in the coming years and hence I wish you would give the opportunity again for the same. Thanking you Yours faithfully, (name) (P.S. You can be personal in expressing your experience working there.)
